email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per metric ton? The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $48.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and that the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. Also, could you send over the full vessel details for our records? Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $48.00 works for you. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. I’ll send over the full vessel details shortly. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’ll proceed with the fixture at $48.00 per metric ton. Please send over the fixture recap for our review. Looking forward to working with you on this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find attached the fixture recap for the crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The agreed freight rate is $48.00 per metric ton, laycan 15-20 October, and demurrage at $15,000 per day. Let me know if everything looks good. Best regards, Sarah
